content: this tutorial for a crocheted yoke was made in collaboration with la tessoria sizes tutorial is written for two sizes but it is extremely easy to make it in any other size all you need to do is to make as many squares as needed to make it fit around child s chest then cut the fabric according to your own measurements desired length and width of the skirt part baby 9-12months toddler up to 3 years materials any sport weight yarn approx 50g for smaller size and up to 100g for bigger sizes i used a linen/ viscose blend yarn but any other yarn will work just fine with the yarn weight you can also make experiments and use some thicker yarn as well in this case you will simply have to make less squares crochet hook 3 25mm d or size needed to obtain gauge 4 small buttons can use only 2 if prefer tapestry needle fabric two pieces each 15x18inches for baby size or 18x21inches for toddler size 4 stitch markers optional you can use contrasting color yarn as well to mark stitches pins optional sewing machine optional all seams can be hand sewn as well gauge 11dc and 5 row = 2inches stitches used st s stitch es chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch
